title: U.S. Takes Aim at Iran’s Drone Program, Seeing Risk to Mideast Stability
sub_head: Iran’s drones are seen as a more immediate danger than its nuclear program, Western security officials say
body:
WASHINGTON—The Biden administration on Friday levied sanctions against several Iranian companies and their executives whom the U.S. has linked to Tehran’s effort to develop armed drones for attacks on U.S. forces and allies.
The administration’s action marks the start of campaign against Iran’s evolving unmanned aerial vehicle and precision-guided missile programs, which Western officials say represent a more immediate threat than Iran’s nuclear-enrichment and ballistic-missile programs.
